patthana23.1:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.1:5.2: Nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.1:6.1: Naakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.1:6.2: Naakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.1:7.1: Naabyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.1:7.2: Naabyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana23.1:8.1: Nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca naabyākataṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.1:10.1: Nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca naakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.1:11.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
